movies.title: Jawan
movies.about: A high-octane action thriller that outlines the emotional journey of a man who is set to rectify the wrongs in society.

movies.title: The Great Indian Family
movies.about: Home is where `The Great Indian Family` is!

movies.title: Expend4bles
movies.about: Armed with every weapon they can get their hands on, the Expendables are the world`s last line of defense and the team that gets called when all other options are off the table.

movies.title: The Nun II
movies.about: The sequel to the worldwide smash hit follows Sister Irene as she once again comes face-to-face with Valak, the demon nun.

movies.title: Sukhee
movies.about:
A light-hearted, slice-of-life story of Sukhpreet `Sukhee` Kalra, a 38-year- old Punjabi housewife who, fed up of her everyday, mundane life, goes to Delhi to attend her school reunion.

Sukhee relives the 17-year-old version of herself whilst going through a plethora of experiences in a span of just seven days, coming out rekindled, reborn and making the most difficult transition in her life - from being a wife and a mother, to being a woman again.

movies.title: Gadar 2: The Katha Continues
movies.about: Gadar 2 brings back India`s most loved family of Tara, Sakeena and Jeete; 22 years after its predecessor. Set against the backdrop of Indo-Pakistan war of 1971, Tara Singh, once again, will face every enemy to protect the honor of country and family.

movies.title: Dream Girl 2
movies.about: Karam, a small-town boy from Mathura, is struggling to pay his father`s debt, who has borrowed money from nearly everyone on the planet. On the other hand, he is deeply in love with Pari, whose father has kept conditions to marry her. To make ends meet, Karam dons as Pooja, which creates wild chaos and a comedy of errors.

movies.title: A Haunting in Venice
movies.about: Set in eerie, post-World War II Venice on All Hallows` Eve, A Haunting in Venice is a terrifying mystery featuring the return of the celebrated sleuth, Hercule Poirot. Now retired and living in self-imposed exile in the world`s most glamorous city, Poirot reluctantly attends a seance at a decaying, haunted palazzo. When one of the guests is murdered, the detective is thrust into a sinister world of shadows and secrets.

movies.title: Hu ane Tu
movies.about: Umesh, rekindles his romance with his long-lost college crush Ketaki, a divorcee. Meanwhile, Umesh`s son Tejas, meets the girl of his dreams, Reva. As the father and son prepare for a double wedding, they encounter numerous challenges. What ensues is roller-coaster ride entailing misunderstandings, twists, and trials as they navigate the crossroads of tradition and modernity.

movies.title: 3 EKKA
movies.about: Three friends stuck in financial crises, come up with an idiotic plan to transform a simple middle-class house into a secret gambling den. A series of mishaps inside and outside the gambling den keep piling up. Will they win or lose?
